title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 508.6 - Program incentives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 508.6 - Program incentives

State Regulations
(a) Subject to the availability of funds, program incentives shall be paid to
owners for qualified occupied square footage, as follows: Program Incentive by Number of Dwelling

(b) No
owner shall receive more than $120,000 in program incentive payments during any
calendar year. Notes
